name: Play REAL FOOTBALL TOURNAMENT 2014
description:
Real Football tournament 2014 is the latest, with amazing soccer 3D realistic graphics and immersive sound effect for your entertainment. Experience the ultimate football game on smartphone. 3D visuals-graphics and animations bring the game to life.
You can choose your favorite national team from the teams participating in the 2014 World Championship Brazil:
- United Kingdom
- Spain
- German
- Italy
- USA
- Indonesia
- Uruguay
- Argentina
- Brazil
- France
- Portugal
- England
Choose and customize the pools and make the semifinals and final with your desire teams like Netherlands vs Argentina and Brazil vs Germany .
Play the game and become the part of supporting of your team, cheer with crazy crowd enjoy the football stadium field environment.
Are you ready?

How to Play:
• Shoot the ball to kick it out
• Swipe and pass to adjust the direction of the football while it is in the air
• By the Arial view you can make the strategy.
• Pass the ball between the players.
• By using the joy stick, you can perfectly interact with the football properly.
